description: Relative precipitation anomalies are based on downscaled ERA5 reanalysis data (downscaling is performed using quantile mapping method) and calculated for different time scales (1, 2, 3, 6, 12 months). The values represent the % of normal precipitation, where normal is defined as the long-term average (1981-2022).
title: Precipitation Anomalies - ERA5_QM REL_RR-3
